title: Truth by Calvin Klein for Women, Eau De Parfum Spray, 3.4 Ounce
description: Launched by the design house of Calvin Klein in 2000, TRUTH PERFUME is classified as a refreshing, oriental, woody fragrance. This feminine scent possesses a blend of fresh, natural rich woods that react to individual skin chemistry. It is recommended for casual wear.
